name: Anger Management (JakeMakes)
description:
Hey there! My name is Gary Ain, and I’m your typical, boring, definitely-not-suppressing-years-of-rage office worker. Tomorrow, I’m going on vacation! I just gotta make it through one more day at the office. Word on the street is you’re the best corporate anger manager around. Help me survive my shift and I’ll be home free! 

Don’t worry, I’m a pretty level-headed guy, so I’m sure it’ll be a cinch!

(Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with my lovely girlfriend)
